It's time to say goodbye. Here's an announcement.
Hello Project 2023 Summer City Circuit is now underway.
Angelem will be performing in Aichi on Saturday the 19th and Tsubaki Factory on Sunday the 20th.
We have a few days left to go, but we will all make it through to the end.
Tsubaki Factory will perform at Uppity Presents Shine Fest 2023 on August 19. And on Thursday, August 24, we will be holding Tsubaki Factory's Summer Festival 2023 Scorching Heat.
We are really working hard as one for this concert, so I hope you are looking forward to it.We are really working as one for this concert, and I hope you are looking forward to it.
On August 26, we will be performing at the At Jamun Expo 2023 Supported by Uptee.
Since it is already summer, I will do my best to train my muscles every day so that I will not lose my stamina for the event.
Angelem is going on an autumn concert tour from May 16th.
New members will be joining the group in earnest from the fall tour, so please look forward to it.
Tsubaki Factory is also going on an autumn tour.
I don't know what songs we will sing yet, but I will do my best to entertain everyone who comes to the concert.
And on September 27, we will be releasing a triple A-side single, "Courage! It's my life! If you're just delusional, you can be free! It's my life!
It's my life!" The songs are all different genres, so I am sure you will find a song that you like.
I am also going to have overseas concerts in Hong Kong and Taiwan.
This is the first time for me to go abroad, so I am very excited to see what I can do and what kind of audience I will have.
Project 25th Anniversary concert will be held on September 9 and 10.
Project 25th Anniversary concert will be held on Saturday and Sunday, September 9 and 10, and all of the current members, including OG members, will perform.
Let's make it a festival-like 2 days!
